<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Riia>Hey, Mom. What's up with Dad...? Where did he go so early in
the morning? Both of you had kind of scary faces...

\N<Segi>...Really? Did Mom's face look that scary? I'll have to be
careful then. If I keep making scary faces, I'll start
looking even more like an auntie, huh.
\N<Riia>...
A
\N<Riia>It's okay. I can stay home alone until mom comes back.
\N<Riia>Mama...
op_セノ2a
op_セノ2b
Dad... Mom...
op_セノ2c
Mom...! Mom...!!
\N<Segi>Mm... Mmm...
\N<Segi>A dream... huh.
\N<Segi>The same... again... that dream from that time...
\N<Riia>Mom, what's wrong? You were having a nightmare...?

\N<Segi>Is that so... I'm sorry for worrying you. Mom's okay, don't
worry.
\N<Riia>Yeah.

\N<Segi>Oh no, it's already this late... I wonder if Lord Yuia will
be coming home soon.
\N<Segi>Hey, Dad's late, isn't he. Should Mom go to pick him up?
\N<Riia>Going to pick up Dad? Then I'll go too!
\N<Segi>Can't be helped... You're always such a baby.
\N<Riia>I-I'm not a baby!

\N<Segi>Really? Maybe Mom should go alone then. Can you stay home by
yourself?
\N<Riia>Ah, I'm not a baby, but... today I want to go with Mom.
\N<Segi>Fufu...
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

From now on, you can access the status screen and freely

DW_目標設定 Go_to_the_management_office_north_of_town_to_pick_up_Yuia.
A
\N<Segi>I'm back now...
\N<Riia>Welcome back, Mama.
\N<Yuia>Welcome home. Is the discussion still ongoing?

\N<Segi>...Yes. But I couldn't bear to listen any further, so I
turned my back on it...

\N<Yuia>Don't worry about it. I think I've got a pretty good grasp
of the situation.

\N<Segi>Even so, to think that they would choose at least one
representative from each family to fight...

\N<Yuia>They claim it's a strategy for training soldiers, right? But
even that's suspicious.

\N<Yuia>Sure, it's obvious that a vigilante group protecting the
town would be better with strong members. But do you think
there's any sense in making residents duel each other?
\N<Segi>That is...

\N<Yuia>There's no way. Such things are nothing more than
entertainment for those stationed far from their hometowns
in this city.
\N<Segi>Yes... I think so too.

\N<Segi>But I have one question... What happens to the families that
can't produce a representative?

\N<Yuia>Well... logically, the men of the house would normally step
forward as representatives, meaning as warriors.

\N<Yuia>However, as you say, there must be houses without men, or
where the men can't fight due to illness or injury.

\N<Segi>Yes... Surely such families wouldn't be subjected to even
harsher laws...

\N<Yuia>From what I've heard, even if they are sick or injured, they
are still chosen as warriors.

\N<Yuia>If there are no men available... it might be that a woman
from the household will be chosen as a warrior instead.
\N<Segi>That's... terrible...

\N<Yuia>Moreover, I've heard that women and children who aren't
registered as warriors will eventually be used as labor for
weapon manufacturing and such.

\N<Yuia>Either way, there might be no other choice but to think that
there's no escape...
\N<Segi>...
A
\N<Riia>...Understood. I'll wait here for Mom and Dad.
\N<Yuia>...It's time. Well then... I'm off.

\N<Segi>...Please allow me to accompany you part of the way. I...
can't bear to watch the match, though...

\N<Yuia>That's fine. I don't want you to see a showdown between
fellow townspeople anyway.
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...
\N<Yuia>Well then, shall we go?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
ユイア
face01
Actor1_8
DW_目標設定 Head_to_the_coliseum_in_the_east_of_the_town.
A
\N<Segi>Ah, an assassination...!? You mean of Zuuteruka...!?
\N<Yuia>...Yes.

\N<Yuia>Of course, it's a cruel act, but we're dealing with an
organization that has this much power. Deciding on a course
of action isn't simple. Besides, it's not a problem that can
be solved by me alone.

\N<Yuia>However... if we leave them be, we'll eventually reach a
point of no return. No, it would be more accurate to say
we've already reached it.

\N<Yuia>The recent military training assembly is a prime example.
Having participated in today's battle, I understood well. We
can't let such a thing go unchecked...
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...

\N<Yuia>...Now is the only chance for an uprising. With the military
assembly taking place and the movement of weapons and
warriors becoming more active, now is the best opportunity
for us to disguise our actions.
\N<Segi>Us...? Are you saying there are other comrades involved?

\N<Yuia>...Yes. As I said before, the matter is grave. It's not
something that can be resolved with just my power alone.
\N<Segi>But... assassination, that's... that's such a...

\N<Yuia>It's no surprise you're shocked. Of course, there's no
guarantee of success. In fact, I can't even assert whether
it's possible or not.
\N<Segi>Then...
\N<Yuia>I'm prepared for the danger. But this is the only way.

\N<Yuia>Otherwise, as you said, more unnecessary and unjust sorrow
will continue to be born. To the people of the town and...
perhaps even to you and Riia.

\N<Segi>But... I'm worried. Even if it's for my and Riia's sake, I
don't want you, Lord Yuia, to cross dangerous bridges...

\N<Yuia>It's okay. I'll manage somehow. Besides, I have no intention
of forever doing what they tell me to do.

\N<Yuia>They are cunning. If we sit idly by, eventually they will
bring about my demise.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Yuia>If that's the case, I think we should take action. And I
believe now is the time to do so.
\N<Yuia>Do you... understand?

\N<Segi>That's right... We as a couple should know them better than
anyone else...
\N<Yuia>...Yes.

\N<Segi>...I understand. Of course, I'm anxious but... I trust you,
Lord Yuia.
\N<Yuia>Thank you... Segi.

\N<Segi>No, we are a couple after all. Your feelings are our
feelings... aren't they?

\N<Yuia>Yes, don't worry. Everything will be fine, I will definitely
protect you both.
\N<Segi>Yes... I believe in you.
A

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia, please wait a little longer for your meal. I will
prepare it shortly.
\N<Yuia>Ah, my apologies, Segi. I'm going to step out for a bit.
\N<Segi>Where are you going at this hour?

\N<Yuia>To a meeting about the plan we discussed yesterday... you
see, we're short on time. I want to get as much settled as
possible.

\N<Segi>...Understood. But please be careful. You never know who
might be listening in.
\N<Yuia>Ah, I'll be careful.
A
\N<Rozaro>Sorry for the early disturbance, it's me. Can you open up?
\N<Segi>Mr. Rozaro.
\N<Rozaro>Hey, Ms. Segi. Sorry for the hour. Is Yuia around?

\N<Segi>Well... my husband isn't here right now. He stepped out a
little while ago...
\N<Rozaro>Stepped out...? Ah, I see. So I just missed him.

\N<Segi>That... I think he'll be back soon. If you have business
with him, would you like to wait inside until he returns?

\N<Rozaro>No, I appreciate the offer, but I'll decline. I'll visit
Yuia some other time.

\N<Segi>Is that so... Understood. I'll let him know you stopped by
when he returns.
\N<Rozaro>Yeah, please do that.
\N<Riia>Master! Where are you going?

\N<Rozaro>Training. A warrior must hone himself, even in the briefest
moments of time.
\N<Segi>Training...? You're not heading to the ruins, are you?

\N<Rozaro>Yes, though nowadays it's referred to as a training facility
by the Luda folks.
\N<Segi>A training facility...?

\N<Rozaro>The intent behind the name is probably a place to assess
warriors participating in the training assembly.

\N<Rozaro>Indeed, that place is a den of monsters. It's probably
perfect for testing one's mettle as a strong warrior they
seek.
\N<Segi>I heard... it was originally a tunnel dug using prisoners.

\N<Rozaro>Exactly. In the process, rare resources were discovered. But
at the same time, dangerous monsters were found living there
too.

\N<Rozaro>Moreover, the inside of the ruins was filled with toxic
gases. That's why I heard the mining operations were
suspended.
\N<Segi>To such a dangerous place? Are you sure it's safe?

\N<Rozaro>The toxic gases continue to seep out even now. But with the
Luda people in town, there's a way to avoid it.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Rozaro>To venture inside the ruins, we have no choice but to borrow
their technology. But of course, I have no intention of
becoming a lapdog for them like Yuia has.

\N<Rozaro>Sharpening my skills and strength at the facility isn't for
their sake. It's solely to gain the power to protect myself
and others.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Rozaro>Oops, seems I got carried away talking. I'll take my leave
now. Please give my regards to Yuia.
\N<Segi>...Yes. Please be careful...
\N<Riia>What's wrong, Mama? You look scared...
\N<Segi>Haha, it's nothing. I was just lost in thought.

\N<Segi>Hey, Riia. Mama will step out for a bit too. Can you stay
home alone?
\N<Riia>Mama, where are you going?
\N<Segi>Just... somewhere.

\N<Riia>Okay. It's fine. I can stay home alone until Mama comes
back.

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...

\N<Segi>You promised to protect me and Riia... I believe in that
promise... I won't doubt you, Lord Yuia.

\N<Segi>Yes, believe... I'll wait and believe. But... I think that's
not enough.
NE_fb01
NE_fb02

\N<Segi>...It's not good to always be protected. If so, then...
something like that time might happen again...

\N<Segi>I must become stronger too... Otherwise, I can't protect
Riia.
\N<Segi>I must become stronger... before such things happen again...

\N<Segi>The ruins on the outskirts of town... now called a training
ground by the Luda...
\N<Segi>Perhaps if I go there as well...
DW_目標設定 Heading_to_the_ruins_on_the_outskirts_of_town.
A
\N<Segi>I'm back now...
\N<Riia>Mommy!

\N<Segi>I'm home... Riia. I'm sorry for being away for so long. I
must have worried you.
\N<Yuia>Welcome back, Segi. Where have you been until this late?
\N<Segi>I'm sorry... I've worried you as well, Lord Yuia.
\N<Riia>Stop it. Don't get mad at Mom.

\N<Yuia>It's okay, I'm not angry. Mom and Dad get along well, after
all.
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...

\N<Segi>I've been thinking... It's not right to just be protected by
you.
\N<Segi>That's why I thought I had to do what I could on my own.

\N<Segi>But... in the end, because of my overconfidence, I fell into
danger, and then Rozaro-san saved me.
\N<Yuia>Rozaro did?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Yuia>I see...

\N<Yuia>Segi, your sense of responsibility and kindness come through
clearly. And above all, I understand the anxiety you hold
deep in your heart.

\N<Yuia>I feel the same... I firmly hope that what happened that
time will never happen again.
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...

\N<Yuia>That's why I've been training hard up until now. To ensure
that I don't make you feel sad a second time.

\N<Yuia>I promise, I will protect you and Riia. I will become strong
enough for both of us and protect the two most important
people to me.

\N<Yuia>So... I want you to stay by my side and support me. Trust me
and leave it to me. If you do, I believe I can unleash a
great power.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
A
\N<Segi>Eh...!?
\N<Yuia>Wh-What the!?

\N<Luda Soldier>Trainee Warrior Yuia, there are orders to capture you. Come
with us.
\N<Zuuteruka>...
\N<Segi>Gah...!?
\N<Yuia>...
\N<Yuia>...Capture me? Why would there be such orders...!
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, why, you ask... Do you need an explanation? Yuia.
\N<Segi>Ah!?
\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka...!!

\N<Zuuteruka>It's been a while, hasn't it, Yuia and Segi. How many years
has it been?
\N<Segi>Could it be...
\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka... You couldn't possibly have known...

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, of course I did. I haven't forgotten about you guys
for even a moment.

\N<Zuuteruka>I've been searching for a long time since then. Who would've
thought we'd meet in a place like this? Maybe it's fate or
something?
\N<Yuia>Don't joke around... I can't accept such a fate...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, is that so? It seems you have a lot you want to say
to me. Well, we'll have plenty of time to talk at the
detention center.
\N<Yuia>You said you're going to capture me... On what charge?

\N<Zuuteruka>Oh come on, don't play dumb now. Yuia, your plans have been
completely exposed.
\N<Yuia>Plans... What are you talking about?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, still going to play innocent? I'll tell you, it's
useless. Someone spilled all your plans out of self-
preservation.
\N<Yuia>...I'm telling you I don't know what you're talking about.

\N<Zuuteruka>Trusting people too much can be a problem, huh? Well, take
this as a lesson for the future—if there is a future for
you, that is.
\N<Segi>Please wait... Capturing without investigation...!

\N<Zuuteruka>That's why we're going to thoroughly investigate now. Though
the outcome is pretty clear, hehehe.
\N<Zuuteruka>Hey, take him away.
\N<Luda Soldier>Yes, sir.
\N<Yuia>Gah...! Don't touch me!!
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia!!
\N<Riia>Papa!!
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Yuia>Wait! Don't come near Segi and Riia! Whatever suspicions you
have against me, my family is unrelated!!
\N<Luda Soldier>...What shall we do, Lord Zuuteruka?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hmm... Hehehe, Segi. There are many things I want to ask you
later. Come to the detention center afterwards.
\N<Zuuteruka>If you do that, I might overlook this situation here.

\N<Yuia>What are you saying...!? What do you want with my wife! The
suspicion is on me alone, isn't it!?
\N<Yuia>Ga... Ah!?
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia!!

\N<Zuuteruka>Stop your wailing, Yuia. I'm talking to Segi. So? What will
it be? Eh?

\N<Segi>I understand... I'll do as you say. So please stop being
rough with Lord Yuia and the child...!
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, you're quite understanding. That's good.

\N<Zuuteruka>Tomorrow morning... come to the detention center at dawn. Of
course, come alone.

\N<Zuuteruka>Just to make it clear, don't even think about escaping. If
you do anything suspicious, who knows what will happen to
your husband?
\N<Segi>G...h!!

Oh no... It's happening again. The same thing is happening
again.

My slowness has led to this... my loved ones are being taken
away from me.

...I must avoid this at all costs... I must not let it
repeat.
air01

\N<Riia>Mama... have you been awake this whole time? Couldn't you
sleep...?
\N<Segi>...It's okay. Mama will be fine.

\N<Riia>What about Papa...? What happened to Papa...? Where did he
go...?

\N<Segi>Papa will be... surely fine. Mama is going to go to Papa...
okay? I'll go see his cheerful face... okay?
\N<Riia>...

Everything before me is growing dark. As my head grows
heavier, I'm disgusted with my own powerlessness.

Ever since we left the country together... what have I been
doing? If I had been alone from the start... what could I
have achieved?
DW_目標設定 Head_to_the_management_office_north_of_town.
A
\N<Segi>...
